verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* \add gifts\add*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, I \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w have|strong="G2309"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w ignorant|strong="G0050"\w*.

Ye \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, carried \w away|strong="G0071"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w these|strong="G3588"\w* \w dumb|strong="G0880"\w* \w idols|strong="G1497"\w*, even \w as|strong="G5613"\w* ye were \w led|strong="G0520"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* I \w give|strong="G1107"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* to \w understand|strong="G1107"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w calleth|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w accursed|strong="G0331"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w say|strong="G2036"\w* that \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* is the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* there \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w diversities|strong="G1243"\w* of \w gifts|strong="G5486"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w differences|strong="G1243"\w* of \w administrations|strong="G1248"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w diversities|strong="G1243"\w* of \w operations|strong="G1755"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w worketh|strong="G1754"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w manifestation|strong="G5321"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* is \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* to profit \w withal|strong="G4851"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* to \w one|strong="G3739"\w* is \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*; to \w another|strong="G0243"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*;

\w To|strong="G1161"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*; \w to|strong="G1161"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* the \w gifts|strong="G5486"\w* of \w healing|strong="G2386"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*;

\w To|strong="G1161"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* the \w working|strong="G1755"\w* of \w miracles|strong="G1411"\w*; \w to|strong="G1161"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w*; \w to|strong="G1161"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w discerning|strong="G1253"\w* of \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*; \w to|strong="G1161"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \add divers\add* \w kinds|strong="G1085"\w* of \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*; \w to|strong="G1161"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* the \w interpretation|strong="G2058"\w* of \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G5023"\w* \w worketh|strong="G1754"\w* that \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w selfsame|strong="G0846"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w dividing|strong="G1244"\w* to every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w severally|strong="G2398"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* he \w will|strong="G1014"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w as|strong="G2509"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w members|strong="G3196"\w* of that \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w*, \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*: \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add is\add* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w are|strong="G0907"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \add we be\add* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1672"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \add we be\add* \w bond|strong="G1401"\w* \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w free|strong="G1658"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* have \w been|strong="G4222"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* made to \w drink|strong="G4222"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w member|strong="G3196"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* the \w foot|strong="G4228"\w* shall \w say|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Because|strong="G3754"\w* I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*; \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w it|strong="G5124"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3844"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* the \w ear|strong="G3775"\w* shall \w say|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Because|strong="G3754"\w* I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w eye|strong="G3788"\w*, I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*; \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w it|strong="G5124"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3844"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*?

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \add were\add* an \w eye|strong="G3788"\w*, \w where|strong="G4226"\w* \add were\add* the \w hearing|strong="G0189"\w*? \w If|strong="G1487"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \add were\add* \w hearing|strong="G0189"\w*, \w where|strong="G4226"\w* \add were\add* the \w smelling|strong="G3750"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* \w hath|strong="G5087"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w set|strong="G5087"\w* the \w members|strong="G3196"\w* \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it hath pleased \w him|strong="G2309"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w member|strong="G3196"\w*, \w where|strong="G4226"\w* \add were\add* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \add are they\add* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w*, \w yet|strong="G3303"\w* \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w eye|strong="G3788"\w* \w cannot|strong="G1410"\w* \w say|strong="G2036"\w* unto the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* of \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*: \w nor|strong="G2228"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* the \w head|strong="G2776"\w* to the \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w*.

\w Nay|strong="G0235"\w*, \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* those \w members|strong="G3196"\w* of the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w seem|strong="G1380"\w* to \w be|strong="G5225"\w* more \w feeble|strong="G0772"\w*, \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w necessary|strong="G0316"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \add members\add* of the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* we \w think|strong="G1380"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* less \w honourable|strong="G0820"\w*, upon \w these|strong="G5125"\w* we \w bestow|strong="G4060"\w* more \w abundant|strong="G4053"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w uncomely|strong="G0809"\w* \add parts\add* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* more \w abundant|strong="G4053"\w* \w comeliness|strong="G2157"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1161"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w comely|strong="G2158"\w* \add parts\add* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w tempered|strong="G4786"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w together|strong="G4786"\w*, having \w given|strong="G1325"\w* more \w abundant|strong="G4053"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* to \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \add part\add* which \w lacked|strong="G5302"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* there should \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w schism|strong="G4978"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \add that\add* the \w members|strong="G3196"\w* should \w have|strong="G3309"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w care|strong="G3309"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w member|strong="G3196"\w* \w suffer|strong="G3958"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w members|strong="G3196"\w* suffer with \w it|strong="G4841"\w*; \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w member|strong="G3196"\w* be \w honoured|strong="G1392"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w members|strong="G3196"\w* rejoice with \w it|strong="G4796"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* \w in|strong="G1537"\w* \w particular|strong="G3313"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w set|strong="G5087"\w* \w some|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, \w first|strong="G4412"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*, \w secondarily|strong="G1208"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w thirdly|strong="G5154"\w* \w teachers|strong="G1320"\w*, after \w that|strong="G1899"\w* \w miracles|strong="G1411"\w*, \w then|strong="G1534"\w* \w gifts|strong="G5486"\w* of \w healings|strong="G2386"\w*, \w helps|strong="G0484"\w*, \w governments|strong="G2941"\w*, \w diversities|strong="G1085"\w* of \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*.

\add Are\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*? \add are\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*? \add are\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w teachers|strong="G1320"\w*? \add are\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* workers of \w miracles|strong="G1411"\w*?

\w Have|strong="G2192"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w gifts|strong="G5486"\w* of \w healing|strong="G2386"\w*? \w do|strong="G3361"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* with \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*? \w do|strong="G3361"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w interpret|strong="G1329"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* covet \w earnestly|strong="G2206"\w* the \w best|strong="G2909"\w* \w gifts|strong="G5486"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* shew \w I|strong="G1166"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* a more \w excellent|strong="G5236"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w*.
